comments.body: UpdateOn the last Friday our founder and CEO Åke André joined Near HackerHouse Austin for a panel and gave his insights on how you as a founder, should tackle regulation in order to stay compliant as a company!

comments.body: UpdateWe wanted to show our appreciation to the NEAR Foundation and their team for supporting and believing in our project: We met up with Near CEO Marieke Flament in Austin, TX and gave her, her very own Crystals of Naramunz sweater

comments.body: Today we introduced another character makeover: We revealed our new hunter!Luna Ray is a character specializing in ranged combat. Anything that can shoot is right up her alley!
